To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
Date: Sun, 07 May 2000 12:55:44 PDT
Mime-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed
From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>


* Iron Raptor growled as  the base shook with the impact of the Alliance 
attack, she looked over at Teltoli but then her com-link came alive with 
Ramhorn's voice. She nodded...*

" Wise idea, Ramhorn. But I'm afraid that just scouting out the situation 
may be wasting to much time. My scanners detect that it is an Alliance 
attack," she said while looking at the screen of a functioning comp, " and 
by their amo we won't even have a base left if we don't act now. I'm heading 
out to the field, I suggest that you and the remainder of the Maximals do 
the same."

* With that she deactivated her com-link and then turned to Teltoli, she 
gestured to the pile of guns and then to the doors with her hand before 
stepping down from the bridge and walking towards the Ark's doors...*

" I would pick more then just one weapon, Teltoli. But once you have 
selected the right ones for you please make your way to the battle field. 
It's obviously going to be an even longer day."

* With that Iron Raptor made her way to the doors but just before she pushed 
them open she spoke to Iris...*

" Iris, if it's passable please activate the top-side auto guns. They would 
be a real big help right about now."
IRIS: "Only A-6 and B-12 are functional at the moment, but I've already got 
them trained on the enemy, shall I begin to fire?"

* Iron Raptor sighed as she opened the door...*

" That would be nice. Yes...please."

* With that done she closed the doors behind her and looked out at the 
attackers, she noticed that Tavatron and Dinobot were still outside but on 
the other side of the ship opposite to the side the Alliance was attacking, 
she opened her com-link to them..."

" Tavatron, Dinobot. It's time that you both came in. There's an attack on 
the other side of the ship from you but I'm afraid that you'll have to miss 
it. Go and get yourselves repaired, alright? If the battle's still going on 
when you are recovered then join in. Iron out."

* Iron Raptor left her com-link open and looked around, it was then that she 
spotted two new bots off in the distance. She altered her com to them and 
spoke...*

" To bot's 665 and 457 (Carnage + Cyber Claw) at this present time I would 
please wish you to come inside of the Ark. At that time you may receive 
repairs and so on."

* With a quick alterationn she switched to all Maximal frequencies...*

" Attention Maximals, we gotta battle on our hands. If you're repaired then 
please make your way to the battle field, there's fresh weapons in the 
bridge so grab a few on your way by.Iron Out."

* Now with that done it was time to start attacking and stop defending, the 
enemy was not as big as the last but their amo made up for their number.
Iron Raptor growled as she began to walk towards Nemesis Enforcer, she 
roared and then stopped...looking him straight in the optic.*

" Get lost Alliance scum, we need none of your kind around here today!"

* Without even waiting she took a step back and growled, she was in no mood 
to be messed with and it was time to let these enemies know about it!*

" SECOND BEAST MODE!!!!"

* With that she transformed into her SBM and towered over the ground, the 
black exoskeleton super structure almost seeming to draw in all of the light 
around her. (looks like an over-grown Alien, remember).
She roared and then headed for the nearest target...Scavenger!
With a reflex that would even make a viper jealous she opened her jaws and 
brought them down and around Scavenger's shoulders, it would only be nano's 
until her 7 inch teeth sank into his super structure and lifted him high 
into the air!*
